message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  How about $110?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay $110, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $125?
Alice,  $125 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $115.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $120, which is the minimum I'm willing to sell for. Is that a deal?
